name: Roo.QuickTips
desc: Provides attractive and customizable tooltips for any element.

config.name: showDelay
config.desc: Delay in milliseconds before the quick tip displays after the mouse enters the target element (defaults to 500)

config.name: maxWidth
config.desc: The maximum width of the quick tip (defaults to 300)

config.name: Delay
config.desc: in milliseconds before the quick tip hides when autoDismiss = true (defaults to 5000)

config.name: text
config.desc: Body text to display (defaults to '').  This can be any valid HTML markup.

config.name: hideOnClick
config.desc: True to hide the quick tip if the user clicks anywhere in the document (defaults to true)

config.name: minWidth
config.desc: The minimum width of the quick tip (defaults to 40)

config.name: hideDelay
config.desc: Delay in milliseconds before the quick tip hides when autoHide = true (defaults to 200)

config.name: title
config.desc: Title text to display (defaults to '').  This can be any valid HTML markup.

config.name: cls
config.desc: A CSS class to apply to the base quick tip element (defaults to '').

config.name: width
config.desc:
Width in pixels of the quick tip (defaults to auto).  Width will be ignored if it exceeds the bounds of
minWidth or maxWidth.

config.name: interceptTitles
config.desc: True to automatically use the element's DOM title value if available (defaults to false)

config.name: trackMouse
config.desc: True to have the quick tip follow the mouse as it moves over the target element (defaults to false)

config.name: True
config.desc:
to automatically hide the quick tip after a set period of time, regardless of the user's actions
(defaults to true).  Used in conjunction with autoDismissDelay.

config.name: animate
config.desc: True to turn on fade animation. Defaults to false (ClearType/scrollbar flicker issues in IE7).

config.name: autoHide
config.desc:
True to automatically hide the quick tip after the mouse exits the target element (defaults to true).
Used in conjunction with hideDelay.

methods.name: isEnabled
methods.desc: Returns true if the quick tip is enabled, else false.

methods.name: unregister
methods.desc: Removes this quick tip from its element and destroys it.

params.name: el
params.desc: The element from which the quick tip is to be removed.

methods.name: init
methods.desc:
Initialize and enable QuickTips for first use.  This should be called once before the first attempt to access
or display QuickTips in a page.

methods.name: register
methods.desc:
Configures a new quick tip instance and assigns it to a target element. The following config options are supported: 
Property    Type                   Description
----------  ---------------------  ------------------------------------------------------------------------
target      Element/String/Array   An Element, id or array of ids that this quick tip should be tied to
